items.content_html: ClipNote is a lightweight AI-powered web app that helps users quickly summarize long texts, articles, or study notes into concise, easy-to-read summaries. It’s perfect for students and professionals who want to save time while reviewing information.

items.content_html: AxiomAI is a modern, lightweight AI chat application that provides instant access to advanced language models without requiring any sign-up or authentication. Experience seamless conversations with state-of-the-art AI models in a beautiful, responsive interface.

items.content_html: This Tic-Tac-Toe game is a fun, interactive web-based implementation of the classic two-player strategy game. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it’s lightweight, responsive, and simple to play, making it perfect for showcasing your coding skills or having a quick match with friends.
items.title: KuldeepLakum/TicTakToy: This Tic-Tac-Toe game is a fun, interactive web-based implementation of the classic two-player strategy game. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it’s lightweight, responsive, and simple to play, making it perfect for showcasing your coding skills or having a quick match with friends.

items.content_html: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.

items.content_html: 🚀 TicTask – A lightweight, open-source Pomodoro Timer & To-Do List Chrome extension with GitHub-style productivity analytics. Stay focused, track your progress, and share your streaks. Contribute & make productivity open for everyone!

items.content_html: An interactive Markdown note-taking app where users can create multiple notebooks and organize their notes efficiently. Simple, fast, and lightweight—perfect for structured writing and quick ideas.
